xml:
STS-38 Mission: Department of Defense Space Shuttle: Atlantis Launch Pad: 39A Launched: November 15, 1990, 6:48:15 p.m. EST Landing Site: Shuttle Landing Facility, Kennedy Space Center Landing: November 20, 1990, 4:42:46 p.m. EST Mission Duration: 4 days, 21 hours, 54 minutes, 31 seconds Orbit Altitude: 142 nautical miles Orbit Inclination: 28.5 degrees
Seventh mission dedicated to Department of Defense.
Crew consisted of Commander Richard O. Covey, Pilot Frank L. Culbertson Jr., Mission Specialists Robert C. Springer, Carl J. Meade and Charles D. Gemar.
